description: Immaculate 3 level, 20 year old townhouse in a quiet eight home complex, a rare find, first time on the market from the original owner. This rare find offers 3 bedrooms plus den, 2 full baths and a powder room, with an open concept living, dining and kitchen layout. Features include laminated floors, open kitchen, open floor-plan concept and easy care maintenance throughout, plus a large attached double garage. Roof recently replaced. Walking distance to Cascade Heights Elementary and close to Moscrop Secondary. Off Highway 1 with easy access to Downtown, Metrotown, BCIT, SFU, Brentwood, Lougheed and Coquitlam.
